forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
